properties.body:
GULF OF MEXICO.
TEXAS.
DNC 15.
58 FOOT M/V SATISFIED, TEN PERSONS ABOARD, DISABLED
AND ADRIFT DUE TO ENGINE ROOM FIRE
IN 28-38.60N 093-33.33W AT 081515Z JUL.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO US COAST GUARD SECTOR HOUSTON/GALVESTON:
PHONE: 281-464-4854,
EMAIL: HOUSTONSCC@USCG.MIL.
